sqlMap.select:
/* req4800DAO.selectReq4800ChgDetailList - 요구사항 수정이력 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT 'MOD' AS TYPE , A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.CHG_DETAIL_ID, A.CHG_DETAIL_NUM ,A.CHG_DETAIL_TYPE, A.CHG_DETAIL_NM ,CASE A.CHG_DETAIL_OPT_TYPE WHEN '02' THEN SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#,A.CHG_DETAIL_COMMON_CD, A.PRE_DETAIL_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.PRE_DETAIL_VAL,'1') WHEN '04' THEN (SELECT REQ_CLS_NM FROM REQ4000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND REQ_CLS_ID = A.PRE_DETAIL_VAL) WHEN '06' THEN SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.PRE_DETAIL_VAL, '2') ELSE A.PRE_DETAIL_VAL END AS PRE_DETAIL_VAL ,CASE A.CHG_DETAIL_OPT_TYPE WHEN '02' THEN SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#,A.CHG_DETAIL_COMMON_CD, A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL,'1') WHEN '04' THEN (SELECT REQ_CLS_NM FROM REQ4000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND REQ_CLS_ID = A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL) WHEN '05' THEN (SELECT DPL_NM FROM DPL1000 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND DPL_ID = A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL) WHEN '06' THEN SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL, '2') ELSE A.CHG_DETAIL_VAL END AS CHG_DETAIL_VAL ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS REG_USR_NM ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'2') AS REG_USR_EMAIL ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'6') AS REG_USR_IMG ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP , ( SELECT REQ_NM FROM REQ4100 WHERE PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND REQ_ID = A.REQ_ID ) AS REQ_NM FROM REQ4800 A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRJ_ID = #popupPrjId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
ORDER BY A.CHG_DETAIL_ID DESC, A.CHG_DETAIL_NUM, A.REG_DTM DESC

/* req4800DAO.selectReq4800NewChgDetailId - 요구사항 수정이력 등록 (새로운 CHG_DETAIL_ID 따기)*/ SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_DETAIL_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_DETAIL_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_CHG_DETAIL_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(CHG_DETAIL_ID) AS NEW_CHG_DETAIL_ID FROM REQ4800 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.CHG_DETAIL_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
sqlMap.insert: /* req4800DAO.insertReq4800ModifyHistoryInfo - 요구사항 수정이력 등록 */ INSERT INTO REQ4800 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, CHG_DETAIL_ID, CHG_DETAIL_NUM ,CHG_DETAIL_TYPE, CHG_DETAIL_NM, CHG_DETAIL_OPT_TYPE, CHG_DETAIL_COMMON_CD ,PRE_DETAIL_VAL, CHG_DETAIL_VAL ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newChgDetailId#, #chgDetailNum# ,#chgDetailType#, #chgDetailNm#, #chgDetailOptType#, #chgDetailCommonCd# ,#preDetailVal#, #chgDetailVal# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.delete: /* req4800DAO.deleteReq4800ReqHistoryInfo - 요구사항 삭제시 해당 요구사항의 수정이력 삭제 */ DELETE FROM REQ4800 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
